name: nonreproductive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not involved in or relating to reproduction (= the process of producing young animals or plants): The non-reproductive females often help individuals who are breeding. Oysters have a non-reproductive period between May and September. Related words
reproduce
reproductionOpposite
reproductive
More examplesFewer examplesPregnant females are more likely to be affected than nonreproductive females.In the experiment, the scientists used cells from nonreproductive parts of the mouse's body.They removed the nucleus fom the egg cell and replaced it with the DNA from a non-reproductive cell.The treatment increased hormone levels in non-reproductive females.
